newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: NEI Africa says Q1 export orders soar.
newsitem.headline: NEI Africa says Q1 export orders soar.

text.p: NEI Africa Holdings Ltd said on Thursday that its export orders had soared in the first quarter of 1997, with an order intake of more than 100 million rand already matching last year's entire export order book.
Chief executive John Kempster attributed the success largely to greater synergy and co-operation with shareholder Rolls Royce Plc's worldwide sales and marketing network.
Strong performers in the group included NEI Transformers, Reyrolle Switchgear and John Thompson Africa, the company said in a statement.
